title: Music Stars Nominated for Awards in 2026
summary: The Mobo awards are a big music event that celebrates black music in the UK and other places. In 2026, singers Olivia Dean and Little Simz have the most nominations, with four each. Olivia Dean is nominated for her album The Art Of Loving, and Little Simz for her album Lotus. Other artists like Central Cee and PinkPantheress also have multiple nominations. The awards will be given out in Manchester on March 26. This year is special because it marks 30 years since the Mobo awards started in 1996. The founder, Kanya King, says these awards help artists become more successful. New artists like Jim Legxacy and KWN are also nominated, showing that new talent is important. The Mobo awards have helped famous stars like Stormzy and Dave before they became very popular.

background_read: The Mobo awards are a special event that started in 1996 to honor black music in the UK. They help artists become famous and have recognized stars like Stormzy and Dave. In 2026, it will be 30 years old, and many singers are excited to be nominated, including new ones like KWN and Jim Legxacy.
Article_Structure: WHO: Olivia Dean, Little Simz, Central Cee, Kanya King, and other artists
WHAT: The 2026 Mobo awards nominations are announced, celebrating black music
WHY: To recognize and support black artists and mark the 30th anniversary of the Mobo awards

perspectives.description: The awards highlight successful and new black artists in music.
